title: sarasvati annaiyE
sahitya:
sarasvati annaiyE ennNEramum sharaN adaindEn unnaiyE dEvi


anupallavi

  nara stuti sheiden-nAvaip-pAzh sheidEn nAnmukhan nAvil vITrirukkum dEvi


caraNam    sagkla kalA vallI unadaruLAl Umaiyum candak-kavi AvanE inshol
 sukhapANi aLikula vENi sUrar paNi kalyANi rAmadAsan paNiyum shrI
